flavorText: You'd better know how to pray for rain.

foreignData.flavorText: Es wäre gut zu wissen, wie man um Regen betet.
foreignData.name: Löschbares Feuer
foreignData.text: Das Löschbare Feuer fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Es fügt zu Beginn deines nächsten Versorgungssegments diesem Spieler weitere 3 Schadenspunkte zu, falls dieser nicht vor diesem Segment {U} bezahlt.

foreignData.flavorText: Mejor que sepas invocar la lluvia.
foreignData.name: Fuego extinguible
foreignData.text: El Fuego extinguible hace 3 puntos de daño al jugador objetivo. Le hace 3 puntos de daño adicionales a ese jugador al comienzo de tu próximo mantenimiento a menos que pague {U} antes de ese paso.

foreignData.flavorText: J'espère que tu sais prier pour qu'il pleuve.
foreignData.name: Feu éteignable
foreignData.text: Le Feu éteignable inflige 3 blessures au joueur ciblé. Il inflige 3 blessures supplémentaires à ce joueur au début de votre prochaine étape d'entretien à moins qu'il ne paie {U} avant cette étape.

foreignData.flavorText: Meglio che tu sappia come si fa una danza della pioggia.
foreignData.name: Fuoco Estinguibile
foreignData.text: Il Fuoco Estinguibile infligge 3 danni a un giocatore bersaglio. Infligge 3 danni addizionali a quel giocatore all'inizio del tuo prossimo mantenimento a meno che lui non paghi {U} prima di quella sottofase.

foreignData.flavorText: 雨乞いのやり方は知っておくべきだ。
foreignData.name: 消しえる火
foreignData.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。消しえる火はそのプレイヤーに３点のダメージを与える。 あなたの次のアップキープの開始時に、そのプレイヤーがそのステップよりも前に{U}を支払わないかぎり、それはそのプレイヤーに追加で３点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: É melhor que você saiba como pregar pela chuva.
foreignData.name: Fogo Extinguível
foreignData.text: Fogo Extinguível causa 3 pontos de dano ao jogador alvo. Ele causa 3 pontos de dano adicionais àquele jogador no início de sua próxima etapa de manutenção, a menos que ele pague {U} antes daquela etapa.

foreignData.flavorText: Уж о дожде вы должны уметь молиться!
foreignData.name: Подавляемое Пламя
foreignData.text: Подавляемое Пламя наносит 3 повреждения целевому игроку. Оно наносит дополнительные 3 повреждения тому игроку в начале вашего следующего шага поддержки, если только он не заплатит {U} до того шага.

foreignData.name: 可熄之火
foreignData.text: 可熄之火对目标牌手造成3点伤害。 在你的下一个维持步骤开始时，除非该牌手在该步骤之前支付{U}，否则它对该牌手额外造成3点伤害。

name: Quenchable Fire
originalText: Quenchable Fire deals 3 damage to target player. It deals an additional 3 damage to that player at the beginning of your next upkeep step unless he or she pays {U} before that step.

rulings.text: After Quenchable Fire resolves, the targeted player becomes able to perform a special action of paying {U}. This action may be performed any time the player has priority, and it doesn’t use the stack. It may be performed only once, and only before your next upkeep begins. If the player has performed the action by then, the “deal an additional 3 damage” ability won’t trigger. Otherwise, it will. If it triggers, the player can’t stop it by paying {U}.

Quenchable Fire’s delayed triggered ability (and the special action of paying {U}) will affect the player who was targeted by the spell, even if the original 3 damage is prevented or redirected to a different permanent or player.

text: Quenchable Fire deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker. It deals an additional 3 damage to that player or planeswalker at the beginning of your next upkeep step unless that player or that planeswalker's controller pays {U} before that step.
